WorkItem.ClosedComment: Fixed with commit fb30730a1cbb50dcb48544d2528876d65ced02c2. You can update your lib.d.ts to change the type of documentElement from Element to HTMLElement.
WorkItem.Description:
I have written function for get document height. One of the parameters has been
```
document.documentElement.offsetHeight
```
But this parametr doesn't exist in v0.9.1. It exists in pure javascript and previous version (0.9.0.1).
WorkItem.Summary: The property 'offsetHeight' does not exist on value of type 'Element'
